txt.en: 'I commend your efforts, [placeholder]! Come, let us return and report our success to the Free Peoples.'
Mission: Assault on Trestlebridge
Defend Trestlebridge against the second assault!
Defend Trestlebridge against the third assault!
Defend Trestlebridge against the final assault!
Defend Trestlebridge against the first assault!
You should defend against the final assault.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
You have been tasked with defending Trestlebridge from an assault by the enemies of the Free Peoples.
Use the summoning horn at the beginning of the tunnel to summon Radhril to your side.
'[placeholder], an attack is imminent!'
'The Enemy approaches Trestlebridge from all sides!'
You should talk to Radhril.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
'We must protect the town!'
'I will make sure that none enter Nellie Boskin's home!'
'The Enemy is regrouping for another assault!'
You should defend against the first assault.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
'Trestlebridge is saved!'
You should defend against the second assault.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
You should defend against the third assault.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>If Radhril is missing, and the Call Radhril skill is not available, try using the /pet release command.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Prepare yourself for the second assault!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Prepare yourself for the third assault!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Prepare yourself for the final assault!</rgb>
Rest a moment and regroup by the first banner
Rest a moment and regroup by the second banner
'Prepare yourself. The Enemy could strike the town at any moment.'
Rest a moment and regroup by the third banner
Rest a moment and regroup by the fourth banner

<rgb=#00FF00>Defended Trestlebridge against the second assault</rgb>

Use the Call Radhril skill and talk to Radhril
